name: The Big House
description:
The Big House

The Big House is a Reality Gameshow where contestants enter a house and face off in competitions to see who stays, and who is eliminated.  At the end of the season, only one contestant remains in The "Big House".

Features:

  • Procedural Generation: The Big House is built upon systems that procedurally create a unique experience every game.  Contestants have statistics that affect how they do in competitions.  This structure has laid the foundation for future development of the game.  You will never play the same game twice.
  • 5 Minigames: One of the key components to "The Big House" is the competitions.  Competitions are played in a minigame format, with you facing off against the AI to win power in the house.  As the game continues development, we will add more minigames for added replayability.  
  • Relationship System: In "The Big House", if competitions are the yin, relationships are the yang.  Having good relationships with the other contestants is key to being successful.  After all, contestants won't keep around those they don't like.

This game is in active development.  If you like it, let me know!  If you have criticisms, let me know!  Feel free to email me at florocruciblegaming@gmail.com
